SELECT OID AS OID,CODE AS CODE,NAME AS NAME,DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, ORDER_INDEX AS ORDERINDEX,IS_SHOW AS ISSHOW,IS_AUTHORIZED AS ISAUTHORIZED, CREATE_NAME AS CREATENAME,CREATE_TIME AS CREATETIME,OP_USER AS OPUSER,OP_TIME AS OPTIME FROM sso_project
1=1
AND CODE LIKE '%${code}%'
AND NAME LIKE '%${name}%'
AND DESCRIPTION LIKE '%${description}%'
AND ORDER_INDEX LIKE '%${orderIndex}%'
AND IS_SHOW LIKE '%${createName}%'
AND IS_AUTHORIZED LIKE '%${isAuthorized}%'
AND CREATE_NAME LIKE '%${createName}%'
AND CREATE_TIME LIKE '%${createTime}%'
AND OP_USER LIKE '%${opUser}%'
AND OP_TIME LIKE '%${opTime}%'
AND CREATE_TIME >= '${createTimeStart}'
AND CREATE_TIME <= '${createTimeEnd} 23:59:59'

SELECT OID AS OID,CODE AS CODE,NAME AS NAME,DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, ORDER_INDEX AS ORDERINDEX,IS_SHOW AS ISSHOW,IS_AUTHORIZED AS ISAUTHORIZED, CREATE_NAME AS CREATENAME,CREATE_TIME AS CREATETIME,OP_USER AS OPUSER,OP_TIME AS OPTIME FROM sso_project
CODE = #{0}

SELECT '' AS projectCode, '' AS projectName, CODE AS functionCode, NAME AS functionName, '' AS parentCode, '' AS parentName, IS_AUTHORIZED AS isAuthorized FROM sso_project WHERE IS_SHOW = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDER_INDEX ASC

SELECT DISTINCT srf.project_code AS code FROM sso_role_func srf INNER JOIN sso_role_user sru ON srf.ROLE_OID = sru.ROLE_OID AND sru.USER_NAME = #{userName} INNER JOIN sso_function sf ON srf.function_code = sf.code ORDER BY sf.ORDER_INDEX ASC
SELECT CODE AS id, NAME AS text FROM SSO_PROJECT
